text: hananim-ui gippeum-eul guhagi wihae jaesan-eul bachigo geudeul-ui ma-eum-i gangjigham-eun gileumjin gwasuwongwa gat-a manh-eun biga naelyeo gobjeol-ui suhwag-eul gajyeoododa man-il biga naeliji anh-eu myeon gabyeoun seubgilo heubjogsikyeo jusi ni hananim-eun neohoedeul-i boji mosha neun geosdo algo gyesinila
